Dashboard.title: The AI Foundry
Dashboard.subtitle: Centralized hub for incubating, orchestrating, and deploying next-generation Generative AI services.

jobpang.title: JobPang AI Orchestrator
jobpang.description: An autonomous, deterministic, and scalable AI infrastructure that orchestrates the entire career development lifecycle—from diagnostics to strategy.
jobpang.impact: Reduces hiring costs by 60% through autonomous candidate screening and deterministic career guidance.
jobpang.longDescription: JobPang is the 'Brain' behind the next-generation Career Coaching platform. It is not a chatbot—it is an Enterprise AI Orchestrator that automates the work of a senior headhunter. It performs deep diagnostics on Resumes, drafts persuasive Cover Letters, and acts as a deterministic mentor to guide users through their career journey without hallucination.

diagnosis.title: AI Resume Auditor
diagnosis.desc: Goes beyond keywords. It evaluates logic, structure, and persuasiveness using multi-agent critique.

orchestration.title: Anti-Hallucination Mentor
orchestration.desc: A deterministic Q&A engine that provides factual, structured career advice, not just chatty responses.

terminal.step4: >> DETECTED: Lack of quantifiable metrics in 'Project A'
terminal.step5: >> OUTPUT: Structured JSON Feedback + Improvement Plan

scanner.comment: Good technical depth, but fails to demonstrate business ROI. Suggest rewriting 'Project X' with STAR method.

screenshots.s1: Resume Audit: Deep analysis of skill gaps
screenshots.s2: Smart Matching: AI aligning candidates with ideal roles
screenshots.s5: Community Hub: Peer learning and resources

monthler.title: Monthler AI Travel Agent
monthler.description: Local tourism companion that plans personalized itineraries. Ask, Recommend, Compare, and Export your perfect trip.
monthler.impact: Boosts local booking conversion by 35% via hyper-personalized, chat-based itinerary planning.
monthler.longDescription: Monthler is your local travel insider powered by AI. Unlike generic booking sites, it understands context—budget, vibe, and weather—to curate 'Local Gems' itineraries. It guides users through a natural conversation flow: from initial discovery to final booking and itinerary export.

security.title: Smart Local Guide
security.desc: RAG-powered engine that suggests authentic local experiences, avoiding tourist traps.

cost.title: Auto-Itinerary Planner
cost.desc: Generates day-by-day schedules with optimized routes and real-time budget estimation.

terminal.step1: >> USER: 'Plan a 2-day food tour in Da Nang under $100'

scanner.comment: Logical flow established. Travel times minimized. Budget utilization: $85 (Safe).

screenshots.s1: Conversational Intake: Complex context understanding (budget, vibe, weather).
screenshots.s2: Logic Refinement: Handling edge cases and user constraints iteratively.
screenshots.s3: Strategic Planning: AI mapping optimal routes and schedules.
screenshots.s4: Final Execution: Detailed voucher generation and confirmation.

genai-poc.title: GenAI Multi-Modal Studio
genai-poc.description: All-in-one playground for Text, Image, Audio, and Vision generation. A full-stack SaaS blueprint.
genai-poc.impact: Accelerates time-to-market for multi-modal AI applications by providing a production-ready blueprint.
genai-poc.longDescription: The Swiss Army Knife of AI. This project demonstrates a complete SaaS architecture integrating the 'Big Four' modalities: Text, Image, Audio, and Vision. It features a modern Next.js frontend coupled with a powerful NestJS processing backend.

multimodal.title: 4-Dimensional GenAI
multimodal.desc: Seamlessly switch between generating DALL-E 3 images, Whisper transcription, and GPT-4 writing.

saas.title: SaaS Architecture
saas.desc: Production-ready structure with Auth, Dashboard, and Marketing pages pre-configured.
